content.name: Реактивная стыковка
content.description: Мод reactive docking добавляет/улучшает механику стыковки и поведения кораблей.
content.author: Runekn

text.name: Reactive Docking
text.description: Separates the different docking behaviors for subordinates of carrier and non-carrier (but with landing pads) into options available to both ship types
text.author: Runekn
